titles.title: Recognizing the importance of diapers to infant health and family well-being, and expressing support for the designation of the week of September 23-29, 2024, as "National Diaper Need Awareness Week".

Recognizing the importance of diapers to infant health and family well-being, and expressing support for the designation of the week of September 23-29, 2024, as "National Diaper Need Awareness Week".

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Accountability.

bill.summary: This resolution expresses support for the designation of National Diaper Need Awareness Week.
